lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski had no lingering effects from his involvement in a fiery crash during Saturday night’s Busch Series race at California Speedway and was cleared to race this weekend in Richmond, Va. JR Motorsports then signed the 23-year-old Keselowski to finish the season in the No. 88 Chevrolet.
